item.title: COVID-19 Cases in Spain
item.description: #installing package #devtools::install_github("joachim-gassen/tidycovid19") library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages --------------------- tidyverse 1.3.0 -- ## v ggplot2 3.3.2 v purrr 0.3.4 ## v tibble 3.

item.title: COVID-19 Cases in Spain
item.description: knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE) #installing package #devtools::install_github("joachim-gassen/tidycovid19") library(tidyverse) library(tidycovid19) library(zoo) library(ggplot2) library(kableExtra) library(DT) library(bookdown) library(blogdown) covid_data_spain <- download_merged_data(cached = TRUE, silent = TRUE) %>% filter(country == "Spain") Data Description The data is taken from https://github.
